info.title: Data8 Data Enrichment
info.description: Data8 helps you build confidence in your data. We can save you money by cleaning and enriching both your existing data, as well as ensuring only the highest quality data goes in at the point of entry, leaving you to concentrate on targeting and communicating to the right customers.

post.description: Check, verify and validate if a provided name is likely a real and usable name or whether it is unusable, salacious, random or blank.

Forename.description: The first name of the full name
Forename.title: First name

MiddleName.description: The middle name of the full name
MiddleName.title: Middle name

Surname.title: Last name
Surname.description: The last name of the full name

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

Result.description: A blank value indiciates the name is a usable name. If a value is returned it will be one of the following: "IncompleteName", "RandomName" or "SalaciousName"
Result.title: Result

post.description: Checks if a telephone number is registered on the TPS or not.

number.description: The telephone number you want to TPS check
number.title: Telephone Number

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

Callable.description: Returns a boolean value letting you know if it's callable. If false, the number is currently on the TPS.
Callable.title: Is Callable

TelephoneNumber.description: Returns the telephone number if callable, null if not.
TelephoneNumber.title: Telephone Number

post.description: Checks if a telephone number is registered on the CTPS or not.

number.description: The telephone number you wish to CTPS check
number.title: Telephone Number

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

Callable.description: Returns a boolean value letting you know if it's callable. If false, the number is currently on the CTPS.
Callable.title: Is Callable

TelephoneNumber.description: If populated, the telephone number is callable and null if not
TelephoneNumber.title: Telephone Number

post.description: Check if a sort code and bank account number are valid.

sortCode.description: The sort code you wish to validate
sortCode.title: Sort Code

bankAccountNumber.description: The bank account number you wish to validate
bankAccountNumber.title: Bank Account Number

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

Valid.title: Valid
Valid.description: Indicates if the incoming sort code and bank account number could be validated.

SortCode.description: The sort code that has been validated.
SortCode.title: Sort Code

AccountNumber.description: The account number that has been validated.
AccountNumber.title: Account Number

BICCode.description: The BIC code of the bank branch indicated by the sort code.
BICCode.title: BIC Code

IBAN.title: IBAN
IBAN.description: The IBAN code of the bank account indicated by the sort code and account number.

BranchName.description: The name of the bank branch indicated by the sort code.
BranchName.title: Branch Name

ShortBankName.description: A short name for the bank indicated by the sort code.
ShortBankName.title: Short Bank Name

FullBankName.description: The full name for the bank indicated by the sort code.
FullBankName.title: Full Bank Name

Address.title: Address
Address.description: The address of the bank branch indicated by the sort code.

AcceptsBACSPayments.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept payments made through the BACS system.
AcceptsBACSPayments.title: Accepts BACS Payments

AcceptsDirectDebitTransactions.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept direct debit payments.
AcceptsDirectDebitTransactions.title: Accepts Direct Debit Transactions

AcceptsDirectCreditTransactions.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept direct credit payments.
AcceptsDirectCreditTransactions.title: Accepts Direct Credit Transactions

AcceptsUnpaidChequeClaimTransactions.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept claims for unpaid cheques.
AcceptsUnpaidChequeClaimTransactions.title: Accepts Unpaid Cheque Claim Transactions

AcceptsBuildingSocietyCreditTransactions.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept credits from building societies.
AcceptsBuildingSocietyCreditTransactions.title: Accepts Building Society Credit Transactions

AcceptsDividendInterestPaymentTransactio.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept dividend interest payments.
AcceptsDividendInterestPaymentTransactio.title: Accepts Dividend Interest Payment Transactions

AcceptsDirectDebitInstructionTransaction.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept direct debit instructions.
AcceptsDirectDebitInstructionTransaction.title: Accepts Direct Debit Instruction Transactions

AcceptsCHAPSPayments.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept payments made through the CHAPS system.
AcceptsCHAPSPayments.title: Accepts CHAPS Payments

AcceptsCheques.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept payments made by cheque.
AcceptsCheques.title: Accepts Cheques

AcceptsFasterPayments.description: Indicates if the bank branch can accept faster payments.
AcceptsFasterPayments.title: Accepts Faster Payments

post.description: Check, verify and validate to see if an email address is valid, real and would receive email if it was sent one. This acts as a real time email verification service.

email.description: The email address you wish to validate
email.title: Email Address

level.description: The level to which you wish to validate. If unsure, default to Server
level.title: Validation Level

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

Result.description: Contains a status code indicating if the email address could be validated. For more information on the possible status code, please read https://www.data-8.co.uk/resources/support/service-documentation/email-validation/reference/isvalid
Result.title: Result

post.description: Checks to see if an inputted email address is valid to receive email - this is deprecated in favour of PhoneValidation

telephoneNumber.description: The number you want to validate
telephoneNumber.title: Telephone Number

defaultCountry.description: Formatted as numbers i.e. 44 for UK
defaultCountry.title: Default Country Code

UseLineValidation.description: If set to true then the service will use Data8 LandlineValidation on any number it recognises as a UK landline number and InternationalTelephoneValidation on all other numbers. Any validation call will be debited either an InternationalTelephoneValidation credit or a LandlineValidation credit accordingly so please ensure you have LandlineValidation credits available before using this option. The option defaults to false.
UseLineValidation.title: Use Line Validation

UseMobileValidation.description: If set to true then the service will use Data8 MobileValidation on any number it recognises as a mobile number and InternationalTelephoneValidation on all other numbers. Any validation call will be debited either an InternationalTelephoneValidation credit or a MobileValidation credit accordingly so please ensure you have MobileValidation credits available before using this option. The option defaults to false.
UseMobileValidation.title: Use Mobile Validation

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

ValidationResult.description: The simple result for the validation of the telephone number
ValidationResult.title: Validation Result

ValidationLevel.description: The level of validation found for the phone number.
ValidationLevel.title: Validation Level

NumberType.description: Specifies the type of the number provided i.e. Landline or Mobile
NumberType.title: Number Type

Location.description: Current location of the telephone number if available
Location.title: Location

Provider.description: The network provider of the telephone number
Provider.title: Provider

CountryCode.description: Country ISO2 code of the telephone number
CountryCode.title: Country Code

CountryName.description: Country name of the telephone number
CountryName.title: Country Name

post.description: Formats, verifies and corrects a given address into a full formatted address.

DefaultCountryCode.description: An ISO 2 character code for the country to assume the address is in unless otherwise specified. This defaults to GB.
DefaultCountryCode.title: Default Country Code

DetectCountry.description: Set to true to attempt to automatically detect the country from the provided address information, possibly overriding the default country
DetectCountry.title: Auto Detect Country

Country.description: If DetectCountry is set to true, this is taken as additional user input alongside the address to influence the country detection function. The format of this is not enforced, so could be provided as "US", "USA" or "United States"
Country.title: Country

IncludeCountry.description: Includes the CountryName field in the main part of the result
IncludeCountry.title: Include Country

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

MatchLevel.description: Contains a MatchLevel to indicate how well the address matched to PAF. Possible values are OK_Unchanged, OK_Corrected, NOK_Building, NOK_Street, NOK_Town, NOK_NoMatch
MatchLevel.title: Match Level

CountryName.description: Contains the name of the country the address is in.
CountryName.title: Country Name

ResultCount.title: Contains the number of addresses in the Results field. This field is only populated if the ReturnResultCount option is set to true

post.description: Searches for an addresses based on input data such as building number and postcode

licence.description: As the Royal Mail PAF database can be licensed in multiple ways, this parameter indicates under which license you are accessing the data. This must match the variant you have a license or credits for - if you are unsure which option to choose, please contact your account manager
licence.title: License

postcode.description: The full postcode to get addresses for. Formatting of the postcode does not matter so "ch24ne", "CH2 4NE", "ch02 4Ne" are all accepted.
postcode.title: Postcode

building.description: An optional value to filter the returned addresses by building name, number, sub-premise (e.g. flat number) or company name. If null or "" are supplied, all addresses on the postcode are included in the result.
building.title: Building

FixTownCounty.description: true to ensure the town and county are returned in the last two address lines, or false if they should appear in the first available line.
FixTownCounty.title: FixTownCounty

MaxLines.description: The number of lines to format the address over. An additional line will be included in the result for the postcode.
MaxLines.title: MaxLines

MaxLineLength.description: The maximum number of characters that can appear in each address line.
MaxLineLength.title: MaxLineLength

NormalizeCase.description: Converts all text in the address except the town name to proper case.
NormalizeCase.title: NormalizeCase

NormalizeTownCase.description: Converts the town name to proper case
NormalizeTownCase.title: NormalizeTownCase

ExcludeCounty.description: Excludes the county, if any, from the formatted address
ExcludeCounty.title: ExcludeCounty

UseAnyAvailableCounty.description: Uses any available county to populate the formatted address, not just the postal county
UseAnyAvailableCounty.title: UseAnyAvailableCounty

UnwantedPunctuation.description: A string containing any punctuation characters to be removed from the formatted address
UnwantedPunctuation.title: UnwantedPunctuation

FixBuilding.description: Ensures the building name/number is always placed in the first line
FixBuilding.title: FixBuilding

IncludeUDPRN.description: Set to true to have the UniqueReference field of each returned address populated with the UDPRN
IncludeUDPRN.title: IncludeUDPRN

IncludeLocation.description: Set to true to have the Location field of each returned address populated with the geocoding details for the address
IncludeLocation.title: IncludeLocation

ReturnResultCount.description: Indicates if the ResultCount field in the result should be populated with the total number of addresses returned.
ReturnResultCount.title: ReturnResultCount

IncludeNYB.description: Set to true to include addresses from the Not Yet Built database in the results (requires additional licensing)
IncludeNYB.title: IncludeNYB

IncludeMR.description: Set to true to include addresses from the Multiple Residency database in the results (requires additional licensing)
IncludeMR.title: IncludeMR

Formatter.description: Pick from one of the available formatters to control how the raw address is converted into a human-readable address
Formatter.title: Formatter

Result.description: Indicates if the person is found to be deceased
Result.title: Is Deceased

post.description: UK - Identify deceased individuals quickly and easily, using credible sources updated on a regular basis.

Title.description: The title of the name to search
Title.title: Title

Forename.description: The firstname of the name to search
Forename.title: Forename

MiddleName.description: The middle name of the name to search
MiddleName.title: Middle Name

Surname.description: The surname of the name to search
Surname.title: Surname

items.description: A string away of the address elements
items.title: Address Lines

marketing.description: A boolean to determine if the search is being done for marketing reasons or not.
marketing.title: Marketing

MatchLevel.description: The minimum match level between the name supplied in the input record and the name in our reference data files. S is Surname, I is Initial and F is Forename
MatchLevel.title: Match Level

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

label.description: The value to show to the user.
label.title: Label

container.description: Indicates if this match is a container for other addresses (e.g. a town, street etc.). If this is true, the value should be supplied to the DrillDown endpoint to get the details of the addresses in the container record. If it is false, the value should be supplied to the Retrieve endpoint to get the full details of the address.
container.title: Container

SessionID.description: A SessionID is also included in the response. This should be included in any subsequent calls to the Search endpoint.
SessionID.title: SessionID

post.description: Searching with the Data8 PredictiveAddress API - Search for a partial address in our many data sources

country.description: The ISO-2 country code in which the address belongs.
country.title: Country

search.description: The partial address entered by the user.
search.title: Search

telephoneNumber.description: An optional parameter, the telephone number associated with the address can be supplied.
telephoneNumber.title: TelephoneNumber

session.description: The session id that was received in the previous response. This improves efficiency and lookup speeds. This should be included in any subsequent calls to the Search endpoint.
session.title: Session

IncludeMR.description: Includes addresses from the Multiple Residency database in the results (requires additional licensing).
IncludeMR.title: IncludeMR

IncludeNYB.description: Includes addresses from the Not Yet Built database in the results (requires additional licensing).
IncludeNYB.title: IncludeNYB

PreferredLanguage.description: Set this to cy to retrieve addresses in Welsh where available, or en to prefer English. Addresses are returned in English when this option is not specified.
PreferredLanguage.title: PreferredLanguage

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

label.description: The value to show to the user.
label.title: Label

value.description: A unique identifier for the match that can be supplied to the DrillDown or Retrieve endpoints.
value.title: Value

container.description: Indicates if this match is a container for other addresses (e.g. a town, street etc.). If this is true, the value should be supplied to the DrillDown endpoint to get the details of the addresses in the container record. If it is false, the value should be supplied to the Retrieve endpoint to get the full details of the address.
container.title: Container

Count.description: The number of matches found based on the information provided.
Count.title: Count

SessionID.description: A SessionID is also included in the response. This should be included in any subsequent calls to the Search endpoint.
SessionID.title: SessionID

post.description: DrillDown with the Data8 PredictiveAddress API - Drill down further into search results

country.description: The ISO 2-character country code of the search i.e. "GB"
country.title: Country

id.description: The value property from the response of previous requests from either the Search or DrillDown methods should be supplied here.
id.title: Id

IncludeMR.description: Includes addresses from the Multiple Residency database in the results (requires additional licensing).
IncludeMR.title: IncludeMR

IncludeNYB.description: Includes addresses from the Not Yet Built database in the results (requires additional licensing).
IncludeNYB.title: IncludeNYB

PreferredLanguage.description: Set this to cy to retrieve addresses in Welsh where available, or en to prefer English. Addresses are returned in English when this option is not specified.
PreferredLanguage.title: Preferred Language

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

items.description: All lines of the resulting address
items.title: Address Lines

Organisation.description: The name of the company at the address
Organisation.title: Organisation

Department.description: The department within the organisation at the address
Department.title: Department

AddressKey.description: Combines with OrganisationKey and PostcodeType to provide a unique key for this address
AddressKey.title: Address Key

OrganisationKey.description: Combines with AddressKey and PostcodeType to provide a unique key for this address. Will be 0 for residential addresses
OrganisationKey.title: OrganisationKey

PostcodeType.description: Indicates if the address is on a "small user" ("S") or "large user" ("L"). A large user postcode is one that is allocated to an individual organisation as a heavy mail user, e.g. DVLA
PostcodeType.title: PostcodeType

BuildingNumber.description: The house number for the address. Note that this is an integer number only. Building numbers such as 12A will be shown in the BuildingName field
BuildingNumber.title: BuildingNumber

SubBuildingName.description: The name of the sub-building for the address. This is typically a flat or apartment number
SubBuildingName.title: SubBuildingName

BuildingName.description: The name of the building. May include number information where the number is not a simple integer
BuildingName.title: BuildingName

DependentThoroughfareName.description: The name of the dependent thoroughfare, i.e. a smaller street off a larger street
DependentThoroughfareName.title: DependentThoroughfareName

DependentThoroughfareDesc.description: The descriptor ("street", "road" etc.) of the dependent thoroughfare
DependentThoroughfareDesc.title: DependentThoroughfareDesc

ThoroughfareName.description: The name of the main street
ThoroughfareName.title: ThoroughfareName

ThoroughfareDesc.description: The descriptor of the main street
ThoroughfareDesc.title: ThoroughfareDesc

DoubleDependentLocality.description: The name of the double-dependent locality - the third-level locality
DoubleDependentLocality.title: DoubleDependentLocality

DependentLocality.description: The name of the dependent locality - the second level locality
DependentLocality.title: DependentLocality

Locality.description: The name of the top-level postal town
Locality.title: Locality

Postcode.description: The postcode in a fixed 7-character format
Postcode.title: Postcode

Dps.description: The 2-character delivery point suffix that uniquely identifies the address within the postcode
Dps.title: DPS

PoBox.description: The details of the PO Box if the address is a PO Box address
PoBox.title: PoBox

PostalCounty.description: The county name that should appear in the address
PostalCounty.title: PostalCounty

TraditionalCounty.description: The county name that was traditionally associated with the address but is not now postally required
TraditionalCounty.title: TraditionalCounty

AdministrativeCounty.description: The county that the address is in for administrative purposes but is not postally required
AdministrativeCounty.title: AdministrativeCounty

CountryISO2.description: The 2-character ISO country code related to the address. This is not populated by the AddressCapture service
CountryISO2.title: CountryISO2

UniqueReference.description: An alternative unique reference number for the address. This is set to the UDPRN number of the address by supplying the IncludeUDPRN option to the method
UniqueReference.title: UniqueReference

Easting.description: The distance of the postcode east of the OS grid origin to the southwest of Scilly
Easting.title: Easting

Northing.description: The distance of the postcode north of the OS grid origin
Northing.title: Northing

GridReference.description: The location of the postcode as a 6-digit OS grid reference
GridReference.title: GridReference

Longitude.description: The longitude of the postcode expressed in decimal degrees in the WGS84 datum
Longitude.title: Longitude

Latitude.description: The latitude of the postcode expressed in decimal degrees in the WGS84 datum
Latitude.title: Latitude

CountyCode.description: The county code that should appear in the address
CountyCode.title: CountyCode

County.description: The county name that should appear in the address
County.title: County

DistrictCode.description: The district code that should appear in the address
DistrictCode.title: DistrictCode

District.description: The district that should appear in the address
District.title: District

WardCode.description: The reference code for the ward the postcode is in
WardCode.title: WardCode

Ward.description: The name of the electoral ward the postcode is in
Ward.title: Ward

Country.description: The 2-character ISO country code related to the address.
Country.title: Country

post.description: Retrieve with the Data8 PredictiveAddress API - Retrieve the full address

country.description: The ISO-2 country code in which the address belongs.
country.title: Country

id.description: The value property from the response of previous requests from either the Search or DrillDown methods, when the container property was false, should be supplied here.
id.title: Id

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: CreditsRemaining

Result.description: Contains a status code indicating if the email address could be validated.
Result.title: Result

EmailType.description: The type of email of the provided and how it's classified
EmailType.title: Email Type

SuggestedEmailAddress.description: A suggested email address to improve this email, if one is provided this should be surfaced so the user has an option to choose to use it.
SuggestedEmailAddress.title: Suggested Email Address

Comment.description: A helper comment as to why a recommendation has been made to provide additional context
Comment.title: Comment

Salutation.description: The salutation that can be used wit this email - i.e. who to address the email to.
Salutation.title: Salutation

post.description: Cleanse an email address, validate it to see if it's a real, genuine email but also take additional details such as a name or company name to enrich further

Email.description: The email address you wish to validate
Email.title: Email Address

Level.description: The level to which you wish to validate. This should always be in the body of the request, never in the url and never in the query parameters. If unsure, default to Server"
Level.title: Level

Title.description: The title or salutation of the name entered, used to help determine if the email address is valid and correct
Title.title: Title

Forename.description: The first name of the name entered, used to help determine if the email address is valid and correct
Forename.title: Forename

MiddleName.description: The middle name of the name entered, used to help determine if the email address is valid and correct
MiddleName.title: Middle Name

Surname.description: The last name of the name entered, used to help determine if the email address is valid and correct
Surname.title: Surname

Company.description: The name of the company to help with identifying if the email is correct
Company.title: Company

post.description: Checks to see if a telephone number is valid to receive a phone call. It will check the current status of the phone line in real time and return a response.

telephoneNumber.description: The number you want to validate
telephoneNumber.title: Telephone Number

defaultCountry.description: The ISO 3166-1-Alpha-2 ISO2 country code to check. If this value isn't provided, use the current users ISO 3166-1-Alpha-2 code
defaultCountry.title: Default Country Code

Success.description: Flag to determine if the request to Data8 succeeded, regardless of result
Success.title: Success

CreditsRemaining.description: Data8 Credits Remaining for the called service
CreditsRemaining.title: Credits Remaining

ValidationResult.description: The simple result for the validation of the telephone number
ValidationResult.title: Validation Result

ValidationLevel.description: The level of validation found for the phone number.
ValidationLevel.title: Validation Level

NumberType.description: Specifies the type of the number provided i.e. Landline or Mobile
NumberType.title: Number Type

Location.description: Current location of the telephone number if available
Location.title: Location

Provider.description: The network provider of the telephone number
Provider.title: Provider

CountryCode.description: Country ISO2 code of the telephone number
CountryCode.title: Country Code

CountryName.description: Country name of the telephone number
CountryName.title: Country Name

x-ms-openai-manifest.humanName: Data8 Data Quality plugin for improving data quality
x-ms-openai-manifest.modelDescription: Plugin to take pieces of data such as but not limited to phone numbers and email addresses and check if they are valid and correct to improve data quality
